author: Ryan Daws
description:
The curl open-source project is grappling with an overwhelming deluge of low-quality “AI slop” security reports. The situation has become so severe that curl founder Daniel Stenberg says it threatens the future of its successful bug bounty programme, sparking a vigorous debate within the developer community about how to protect open-source projects from this new... Read more »

The post Can open-source survive the onslaught of AI slop? appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Can open-source survive the onslaught of AI slop?
